column1: The '''Four Wise Clerks of Oxenford''' were the authorities whom the author of ''[[Farmer Giles of Ham]]'' apparently consulted for the exact definition of a [[Blunderbuss]]
column2: which was the weapon [[Farmer Giles]] used to chase away the [[The Giant|giant]] who came to the village of [[Ham]].<ref>[[J.R.R. Tolkien]]
